title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When modifying the default value in the list box of the report parameter, the previously set value is lost.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Change the default value in the list box.
3. Save the changes.
4. Close and reopen the report. Verify that the modified default value is not retained in the list box.
